title: Bachelor Nation Villains Chad Johnson, Olivia Caridi and Corinne Olympios Party Together in L.A.
text:
Biggest Reality TV Villains Ever! 
The three polarizing reality TV vets posed for a photo that Johnson â€” who made waves on JoJo Fletcher â€™s season of The Bachelorette last year â€” shared via Instagram. â€œWe're just misunderstood ğŸ˜ƒ,â€ the hunky meat enthusiast captioned the pic. â€œTeam Olichorinne @oliviacaridi @colympios â€ A post shared by Chad Johnson (@realchadjohnson) on Feb 22, 2017 at 11:24pm PST 
This isnâ€™t the first time that Caridi (who competed for Ben Higgins â€™ heart on season 20 of The Bachelor ) and Olympios (who is vying for Nick Viall â€™s heart on the current season of the hit dating series) have hung out. The ladies previously got lunch together in L.A. on January 22, which was, of course, documented on Twitter. For all the people who have (so creatively) tweeted "OMG Corinne is the new Olivia" -- this is for you. @CorinneOly pic.twitter.com/ovIL49gJVd â€” Olivia Caridi (@OliviaCaridi) January 22, 2017 
â€œFor all the people who have (so creatively) tweeted 'OMG Corinne is the new Olivia' -- this is for you,â€ Caridi captioned a photo of herself and Olympios giving each other a side hug. Stars Who Got Their Start on Reality TV 
Johnson, who hadnâ€™t spent quality time with the Bachelor hopefuls until Wednesday night, previously told Entertainment Tonight that he has a crush on Olympios. 
â€œYeah [Iâ€™m interested in Corinne],â€ he told ET during a Facebook Live interview on Monday, February 20 â€œI mean, I donâ€™t know what sheâ€™s like in person, but weâ€™ve texted a little bit. I knew that because she was the villain, nobody was really going to be talking to her.â€ 
The Bachelor in Paradise alum added, â€œShe was probably going through this all alone, and you think no matter how hardheaded you are â€¦ I knew people were probably just tearing her down, so I just wanted to let her know, like, â€˜Try not to look at it. Let it pass. It will slow down.â€™ Sheâ€™s good now. â€¦ She seems pretty cool. She obviously doesnâ€™t care at all what anybody thinks.â€ Meet Nick Viall's 'Bachelor' Season 21 Contestants! 
And when Olympios stopped by The Ellen DeGeneres Show on February 1, she also had nothing but sweet things to say about Johnson. â€œHeâ€™s really cool. Great guy, so nice,â€ she gushed. â€œ[He has] my back, like [he tells me]: â€˜Donâ€™t worry about what other people say, I think youâ€™re awesome.â€™ â€œ 
The Bachelor airs on ABC Mondays at 8 p.m. ET.
